description: Twenty-year-old Matt comes to us from Cleveland and enjoys hanging out with friends and partying hearty. He's not really into sports because he's not a team player. But he does like to play sports independently. And he likes to play with himself. There is a wholesome quality about Matt which soon becomes apparent and attractive. He has a slim and natural physique - no bells and whistles with this guy, but it's always the quiet ones that burn the longest and most brightly. Seated on a stool, he plays with his cock, stroking his meat with firm and repetitive motions. Then ready to shoot, he stands up - proud and virile - and blasts away.
title: Matt, Scene #01
